snippet: An Islamist lawmaker was expelled from his party for allegedly fabricating a story that he was beaten by gunmen. Doctors said in fact he had undergone plastic surgery.
abstract: Egyptian Islamist lawmaker Anwar el-Balkimy is expelled from ultraconservative party Al Nour, accused of fabricating a story that he was viciously beaten by masked gunmen to cover up the fact that he had cosmetic surgery; members of the party typically condemn plastic surgery as sinful.
lead_paragraph: An Islamist lawmaker was expelled from his party for allegedly fabricating a story that he was beaten by gunmen. Doctors said in fact he had undergone plastic surgery.

headline.seo: Egyptian Lawmaker Resigns After Lying About Nose Job
headline.main: Egyptian Lawmaker Forced to Resign Over Nose Job
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Lawmaker Is Forced To Resign Over His Nose Job
